title: Data Types & Casting
mission_log: The firewall encrypted passwords as strings. Convert them to integers to bypass security.
challenge: You have "123" and "456". Add them as numbers and print the result.
starter_code:
# Convert strings to numbers and add them
num1 = "123"
num2 = "456"

# Add and print the result
result = 
print()
solution:
num1 = "123"
num2 = "456"
result = int(num1) + int(num2)
print(result)
hints: Convert strings to numbers using int(). Example: int("123") becomes 123
